Most fast food employees are aware of the unique dangers their particular work environment presents, but most don’t know the benefits that wearing quality slip resistant shoes can provide.
Wearing a good pair of slip resistant fast food shoes can reduce the chances of slip and fall accidents caused by spilled water, dropped food, greasy or slippery kitchen floors and many other fast food hazards.
Benefits for Fast Food Workers
New evolutions in fast food shoes provide numerous benefits to fast food workers:
Great styles from well known name brands. Supportive, comfortable shoes designed for those who are on their feet all day. Durable uppers designed to withstand spills and wear associated with working in a fast food restaurant. Up to size 16 shoes in wide and extra wide styles for those with larger feet. Steel toe and composite toe options to reduce injuries from falling pans, dishes, trays, cutlery and so on.
SR Max offers a large selection of shoe styles and colors from the brands you know like Skechers, Crocs, Converse, New Balance and more. Our own line of SR Max brand shoes feature the industry leading outsole technology to provide you with added safety in the work place.
Looking to buy slip resistant shoes? Browse our selection of slip resistant shoes for men and slip resistant shoes for women today.
Benefits for Fast Food Owners / Managers
Eliminating workplace accidents in a fast food restaurant is important for employees, managers and fast food owners alike. Slip and fall accidents can cost thousands of dollars in medical costs, loss of income, rising insurance premiums and even legal fees. Wearing the right type of slip resistant shoes can reduce the occurrence of slip and fall accidents and save fast food franchises money.
A great way for fast food managers and owners to reduce slip and fall accidents is to implement a slip resistant shoe program with SR Max Slip Resistant Shoe Company. A corporate shoe program allows a fast food restaurant owner to provide their employees with easy access to quality slip resistant shoes designed specifically for the hazards the fast food environment presents. Learn more about our corporate safety shoe programs and how they can benefit your company today.
